A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 93%?  Did the critics grow up in the 70s as I did?  I love SW - so much that I am willing to far more forgiving that I am of other movie franchises.  I didn't care for TFA\, but after this - I have to say SW is over for me.  Long live the original trilogy\, and the prequels - yes there were issues\, but they still captured my imagination.
